entry.title: Crystal - Lactose Free Non Hydrogenated Margarine - 907 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crystal
Type: FOOD
Price: 4.99

Crystal - Soft Non Hydrogenated Margarine  - 2 Lbs

  • No trans fat
  • Lactose-free
  • Vegan
  • Non-hydrogenated
  • No artificial flavors
  • Source of omega-3 fatty acids
  • 907g
  • Keep refrigerated

Create a delicious cake that disappears quickly and other delectable treats with this trans free solid margarine. It adds a creamy butter-like flavor to dishes, but contains no cholesterol unlike traditional butter. This margarine is perfect for baking fresh treats to perfection. Plus, it also is an excellent flavor enhancer in sauces, soups, and gravies or use it as a spread. It features the same rich butter flavor your customers know and love at a more economical price. Use it to create delectable and savory dishes that keep your customers coming back for more!

With subtle flavour and a soft consistency, Crystal Margarine is formulated to be directly spreadable from refrigerated temperatures and is ideal for most cooking applications. Made from non-hydrogenated vegetable oil and canola oil, our products are vegan, gluten-free, lactose-free and are an excellent source of omega-3 fatty acids.

We proudly use environmentally friendly packaging. Our Crystal Margarine containers are reusable, dishwasher, and microwave safe.

entry.title: San Vincenzo - Pomace Olive Oil - 3 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: San Vincenzo
Type: FOOD
Price: 14.99

San Vincenzo - Pomace Olive Oil - 3 L

An economical option for your Italian eatery, this pomace oil features a higher smoke point and less distinctive flavor than extra virgin olive oil or virgin olive oil. Olive pomace oil is a refined oil which is extracted from the olive pomace that is left behind after pressing, and combined with virgin olive oil for use. This pomace oil is great for achieving a silky smooth consistency, similar to that achieved by using first press olive oil, without the strong flavor intrusion of such oil. The lighter flavor and milder olive taste is versatile and won't clash with the other ingredients in your recipes.

This multi-purpose oil has many benefits for your commercial kitchen. Since it has a higher smoke point, it's great for frying batch after batch of your fried chicken, fish, or other foods, without imparting an oily flavor. Great for sauteing vegetables or creating marinades, this oil also blends well when making sauces.

entry.title: San Vincenzo - Extra Virgin Olive Oil - 3 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: San Vincenzo
Type: FOOD
Price: 23.99

San Vincenzo - Extra Virgin Olive Oil - 3 L

Pure and healthy, this extra virgin olive oil is a smart addition to any kitchen!

Its light and delicate taste is perfect for finishing focaccia bread, whisking together salad dressings, finishing pastas, and making croutons. Made from pressed olives, this olive oil can be used to add a Mediterranean flair to your menu, with recipes like antipasto platters and chickpea hummus.

Healthier Alternative

Simply substitute extra virgin olive oil for butter or other oils in your cooking, and it's easy to make your menu offerings just a little bit healthier. Compared to other types of olive oil that may be diluted with soybean or canola oil, this extra virgin olive oil is extracted from olives using natural methods.

Easy Pour Spout

Since it is pure, it has enhanced sensory qualities like taste and smell and it is high in healthy antioxidants. Extra virgin olive oil is heart-healthy, and it contains vitamins and beneficial fatty acids. Plus, it's easy-pour spout makes dispensing a breeze. As good for your customers' health as it is for your menu, you're sure to find plenty of uses for this premium extra virgin olive oil!

entry.title: Gallo - Pure Olive Oil - 3 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gallo
Type: FOOD
Price: 24.99

Gallo - Pure Olive Oil - 3 L

With its high smoke point of 460 degrees Fahrenheit, this pure olive oil is an excellent all-purpose oil for your commercial kitchen! Because the smoke point of olive oil varies with quality, this oil has a higher smoke point than a more refined olive oil and pomace oil for optimum versatility. Use it for stir-frying vegetables, sauteing, or creating marinades.

This pure olive oil is made from hand-picked olives that first-pressed for the highest quality and purity. It has a low acidity and mild olive flavor that naturally enhances the taste of your pizzas, soups, and meats. Serve it as a dipping sauce with bread at the start of the meal, or use it in baking. It has a delicate taste and slightly lighter color than extra virgin olive oil, which helps bring out the flavors in your foods rather than overpower them. Whether you're whisking salad dressings or finishing pastas, your customers are sure to love the taste of this pure olive oil!

entry.title: Bunge - Nutra-Clear High Performance Canola Deep Frying Oil - 17.3 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bunge
Type: FOOD
Price: 59.99

Bunge - Nutra-Clear Canola Oil - 17.3 L

Superior 7–12 Day Fry Life Performance*

Nutra-Clear® NT® Ultra is a highly stable cooking and frying oil that delivers great tasting fried food. Its 100% high oleic, low linolenic canola content makes Nutra-Clear® NT® Ultra the most stable oil in its category, giving you an exceptionally long fry life, lower food cost and labor savings. As a pure canola oil it is versatile enough to be used in the back of the house for sauces and vinaigrette’s.

Nutra Clear® NT® Ultra is rated Level 4. Superior performance with a 7-12 day range of quality performance.

entry.title: Saporito - Vegetable Oil - 1 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Saporito
Type: FOOD
Price: 4.99

Saporito - Vegetable Oil - 1 L

From cooking to baking, sauteing to stir-frying, this vegetable oil is great for all of your kitchen needs!

Not only is this oil extremely versatile, but it's also a healthy choice. Its reputation as the most nutritious oil has created high demand. In fact, vegetable oil is currently the third most consumed oil in the world! This vegetable oil is an excellent multi-purpose ingredient for any establishment, and this container will keep your restaurant or cafe in good supply.

vegetable oil is extracted, and refined from harvested vegetable. What makes it so popular among cooking applications is its neutral taste and high heat tolerance that's suitable for anything, including grilling and frying. It can also be used to make salad dressings, sauces, and marinades.

entry.title: Saporito - Corn Oil - 4 x 3 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Saporito
Type: FOOD
Price: 36.99

Saporito - Corn Oil - 4 x 3 L

Fry tortillas, vegetables, and other fresh ingredients with this corn oil! It features a high smoke point that makes it a valuable frying oil, and it's great to use in baking and cooking. A versatile ingredient, this corn oil can even be mixed to create flavorful salad dressings or creamy mayonnaise. Its pleasantly smooth flavor won't mask your finished product, and the consistent quality of this oil makes it perfect for everyday use.

Best of all, corn oil also features a host of benefits for consumers. It can reduce inflammation, lower bad cholesterol, and lower blood pressure when eaten in balanced quantities. Low in saturated fats, this corn oil contains zero grams trans fat per serving. Plus, it's great for cooking thanks to its semi-neutral flavor. For example, if used with rice, fresh bean sprouts, fried eggs, and pork to create a piping hot stir fry, this oil will enhance the flavors without adding its own distinctive taste.

This dependable and multi-purpose corn oil is a great value for a variety of kitchen needs. Compared to other cooking oils, it is naturally resistant to breakdown. Always keep a good supply of corn oil on hand, and stock your restaurant, salad bar, concession stand, or diner with these economical, bulk oil containers!

entry.title: Unico - Sunflower Oil - 12 x 1 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Unico
Type: FOOD
Price: 53.99

Unico - Sunflower Oil - 12 x 1 L

Prepare your dishes to perfection with this 100% sunflower oil!

This sunflower oil is an excellent choice for high heat cooking applications. Use it in place of olive oil when you don't want to add the olive flavor, or use it as a healthier alternative to other traditional frying oils. Use this sunflower oil to bring something new to your menu or create a slightly healthier take on old favorites.

High Smoke Point

Boasting a high smoke point, sunflower oil can be used for cooking, pan frying, and baking. Its light color and mild taste is great for sauces, mayonnaise, and salad dressings.

No Flavor Transfer

Since sunflower oil doesn't transfer its flavor to your food, your patrons will fully enjoy the taste of your signature fried dishes.
